content: https://docs.rs/async-hsm/0.2.0/async_hsm/ has a broken page that makes it impossible to click on any of the types, is that a known rustdoc bug?

It has a misbalanced close tag: https://github.com/frehberg/async-hsm/blob/6cae250ac889031d2da1a0cd6fabe4c763d09a2d/src/lib.rs#L35 and https://github.com/frehberg/async-hsm/blob/6cae250ac889031d2da1a0cd6fabe4c763d09a2d/src/lib.rs#L38
I need to make that lint warn-by-default
let me make a PR for it

Jonas Schievink said:

https://docs.rs/async-hsm/0.2.0/async_hsm/ has a broken page that makes it impossible to click on any of the types, is that a known rustdoc bug?

FWIW docs.rs did make this a little worse on their end recently https://github.com/rust-lang/docs.rs/pull/930 but it also came with like a 100x speedup for parsing large files so I'm not inclined to revert it
